subtitle: The smell of home-made cookies fills the house quickly and all the family will enjoy these.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Put the butter and sugar into a medium sized bowl. Beat until light and fluffy. Stir in flour, milk powder and condensed milk. Stir in the melted chocolate. Mix to smooth dough.
Roll the mixture into walnut size balls. Place on lightly greased baking trays and flatten with the palm of your hand.
Bake in oven for 10-12 min until just firm to the touch. Cool slightly. Then lift onto wire racks to cool completely.
To decorate, spoon a little melted chocolate onto the top of each cookie. Sprinkle with pistachio nuts or walnuts.
